entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.0°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
